title: 2 Bed Apt - Dual Master Bedroom, Walk-in Closets and Washer/Dryer!
neighborhood: 505 N. Figueroa St., Los Angeles, CA
posting_body: ['Imagine a home where the fine art of living has been perfected.', 'Welcome to The Orsini, home to the best apartments in downtown Los Angeles.', 'From the moment you enter the elegant Mediterranean inspired 2-story foyer at The Orsini, you will realize that you have come home to a new experience in luxury apartment living.', 'We are in the heart of Los Angeles, California and the pulse of extraordinary living.', 'Enjoy a short commute to the LA Fashion District, Staples Center, Disney Concert Hall, Chinatown and all the amazing dining and glamorous shopping that living in Los Angeles has to offer.', 'AMENITIES AND FEATURES', "-Separate Men's and Women's Showers/ Dressing Rooms", '-Large Picture Windows', '-Online Payments Available', '-Outdoor', 'Shower to Rinse Off', '-Roof Top Pool and Spa with Spectacular City Skyline Views', '-Self-Cleaning Oven with Gas Range', '-Two Pilates Stations', '-Two Print & Copy Rooms', '-Den/Study', '-24-Hour Doorman', '-Night Patrol', '-Complementary Yoga Classes for Residents', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE', '<URL>', 'ADDRESS', '505 N. Figueroa St., Los Angeles, CA 90012', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.', 'Wholesale District,  Los Feliz,  Los Angeles,  DTLA,  Los Angeles Apartments,  Fashion Institute Apartments,  Fashion District,  Historic Core,  University of Southern California,  Luxury Apartments,  USC Apartments,  University of Southern California Housing,  Central LA Housing,  Hollywood Hills,  FIDM Housing,  DTLA Housing, Downtown,  Bunker Hill,  Griffith Park,  Los Angeles Housing,  Hancock Park,  Silver Lake,  Elysian Valley,  Downtown Housing,  Harvard Heights,  Elysian Park,  Arlington Heights,  Downtown LA Housing,  USC,  Westlake,  Student Housing,  Chinatown,  University of Southern California Apartments,  South Park,  Downtown LA Apartments,  Student Apartments,  Carthay,  Larchmont,  Warehouse District,  FIDM Apartments,  Central Los Angeles Housing,  Central LA,  Toy District,  Central Los Angeles Apartments,  Hollywood,  Old Bank District,  Fashion Institute,  USC Housing,  Financial District,  Luxury Housing,  East Hollywood,  FIDM,  Jewelry District,  Fashion Institute Housing,  Gallery Row,  Windsor Square,  Industrial District,  Arts District,  Civic Center,  DTLA Apartments,  Koreatown,  Downtown Los Angeles Housing,  Central Los Angeles,  DT Los Angeles Apartments,  Downtown Apartments,  Downtown LA,  Downtown Los Angeles Apartments,  Hollywood Hills West,  Downtown Los Angeles,  Mid-City,  DT Los Angeles,  Echo Park,  Pico-Union,  Central LA Apartments,  DT Los Angeles Housing,  Little Tokyo']
